price: Jedhi: "Mee naaf himaa! Yoo adabbiin Rabbii tasa yookiin ifatti isinitti dhufe, sila ummata miidhaa hojjattoota malee ni balleeffama?"
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَىٰكُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱللَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلۡقَوۡمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytakum in atākum ʿadhābu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illā al-qawmu al-ẓālimūna
